job.title: Fullstack Software Engineer
job.description: pAt Starship were working hard to create the healthy future we all deserve by transforming the way people pay for healthcare Were passionate about empowering our customers to take greater control of their financial health and personal wellness building a better tomorrow through superior technology and user experienceppbrppLaunched in 2018 our team of engineers designers and strategists are redefining the 65 billion health saving industry by building innovative solutions for saving spending and investing for healthcare Were bringing together exceptional talent from various disciplines and industries to shape the future of health savings and improve the lives of our customersppbrppAs Software Engineer youll work alongside our Senior Engineering Manager to take our product to the next level by tightening integration and enhancing compliance with industry standards In this role youd work on architecting designing and implementing a system where delivering secure information in real time is essentialppbrppWe seek out engineers who are hardskilled software pros but also thinkers and tinkerers who find creative solutions for complex problems and challenge the status quo We love automation code review and continuous integration and you should too At Starship were constantly iterating and improving our products to provide our members with the best experience possibleppnbspppstrongWhat youll be doingstrongpulliDesigning scalable and resilient data pipelines and handle exponential member growth with confidenceliliContributing to an event driven software stack to keep auditors happyliliDesigning data models and workflows to make use of health financial dataliliCollaborating with engineers and product managers to make sure were building the right solutions for the right problemsliliDeveloping new userfacing featuresnbspliliBuilding reusable code and libraries for future usenbspliliEnsuring the technical feasibility of UIUX technologyliliCollaborating with engineers and product managers to make sure were building the right solutions for the right problemsliliImproving our current techstack found here
